name: Apogee (monkeyfluids)
description:
Move from orbit to orbit, picking up stars and avoiding enemies!

Picking up stars adds to your meter, getting hit costs you meter!

Fill the meter to add an orbit - when the orbits are maxed, get all the remaining stars to open the portal to the next level. Make sure you get to it in time, though...

And remember: you always move at the same speed, so the further out you are, the longer it takes to do a complete orbit.

Controls:

UP ARROW - Move out from the center
DOWN ARROW - Move into the center
P - Pause
C - Change colour scheme

This is version 1.0 - there are lots of things I'd like to add (a proper level structure as well as the current endless mode, powerups, more enemy variety, etc etc) but I need to put something out where people can play it or I'll be tinkering with it forever...

Code and graphics by Josh Addison
